Package com.meepcraft.backbone.api.player

Interface PlayerManager

  • public interface PlayerManager
    Manages and interacts with players in the universe.
    Author:
    Caleb L. Power

    • Method Summary

        server - the name of the server
        message - the message
        Returns:
        true on transmission preflight check success

      • broadcastMessage

        boolean broadcastMessage​(java.lang.String server,
                         java.lang.String world,
                         java.lang.String message)
        Broadcasts a message to all players on a particular world.
        Parameters:
        server - the name of the server
        world - the name of the world
        message - the message
        Returns:
        true on transmission preflight check success

      • broadcastMessage

        boolean broadcastMessage​(java.lang.String server,
                         java.lang.String world,
                         java.lang.String message,
                         java.lang.String permission)
        Broadcasts a message to all players on a particular world.
        Parameters:
        server - the name of the server
        world - the name of the world
        message - the message
        permission - a permission that a player must have to receive the message
        Returns:
        true on transmission preflight check success

      • broadcastTitle

        void broadcastTitle​(java.lang.String title,
                    java.lang.String subtitle,
                    int fadeInDuration,
                    int staticDuration,
                    int fadeOutDuration)
        Broadcasts a title to all players.
        Parameters:
        title - the title in question
        subtitle - the subtitle in question
        fadeInDuration - the duration of the fade-in effect
        staticDuration - the duration of the title
        fadeOutDuration - the duration of the fade-out effect

      • broadcastNote

        boolean broadcastNote​(java.lang.String server,
                      java.lang.String world,
                      org.bukkit.Instrument instrument,
                      org.bukkit.Note note,
                      java.lang.String permission)
        Broadcasts a note to all players in a particular world.
        Parameters:
        server - the server in question
        world - the world in question
        instrument - the instrument in question
        note - the note in question
        permission - a permission required for a player to receive the note
        Returns:
        true on transmission preflight check success

        void broadcastSound​(org.bukkit.Sound sound,
                    float volume,
                    float pitch)
        Broadcasts a sound to all players.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound in question
        volume - the volume of the sound
        pitch - the pitch of the sound

      • broadcastSound

                       float pitch)

        sound - the sound in question
        volume - the volume of the sound
        pitch - the pitch of the sound

        true on transmission preflight check success

      • broadcastSound

        boolean broadcastSound​(java.lang.String server,
                       java.lang.String world,
                       org.bukkit.Sound sound,
                       float volume,
                       float pitch)
        Broadcasts a sound to all players in a particular world.
        Parameters:
        server - the server in question
        world - the world in question
        sound - the sound in question
        volume - the volume of the sound
        pitch - the pitch of the sound
        Returns:
        true on transmission preflight check success

      • broadcastSound

        boolean broadcastSound​(java.lang.String server,
                       java.lang.String world,
                       org.bukkit.Sound sound,
                       float volume,
                       float pitch,
                       java.lang.String permission)
        Broadcasts a sound to all players in a particular world.
        Parameters:
        server - the server in question
        world - the world in question
        sound - the sound in question
        volume - the volume of the sound
        pitch - the pitch of the sound
        permission - a permission required for a sound to be played to a player
        Returns:
        true on transmission preflight check success

      • getGlobalPlayer

        GlobalPlayer getGlobalPlayer​(java.util.UUID uuid)
        Retrieves a global player by unique identifier if they exist.
        Parameters:
        uuid - the UUID of the player
        Returns:
        the global player

      • getGlobalPlayer

        GlobalPlayer getGlobalPlayer​(java.lang.String ign)
        Retrieves a global player by name if they exist. Note: If they changed their name and haven't logged on, they will be known by their old name until it gets updated.
        Parameters:
        ign - the player's in-game name
        Returns:
        the global player

      • updateGlobalPlayer

        void updateGlobalPlayer​(GlobalPlayer player)
        Updates the global player. The player passed in as an argument will be known throughout the universe.
        Parameters:
        player - the player
